definition: variant of 褪色[tui4 se4]/also pr. [tui4 shai3]
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw

sentences.english: Paint with imported painting to guarantee of three-year no fading.
sentences.chinese: 面漆用進口漆，保證三年不退色。

sentences.english: Have you noticed that different shampoos cause your hair to fade differently?
sentences.chinese: 你發現不同洗髮水的退色效果不一樣了嗎？

sentences.english: Love is eternal, whose color never fades.
sentences.chinese: 這份愛是永恆色彩，永不退色。

sentences.english: Though time may have everything, but because the baptism, you won't fade, beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 雖說時間會洗禮一切，但是因爲有你，美好不會退色。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, the dark-colored clothes always fade away gradually.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，深色衣服是會慢慢退色的。

sentences.english: Each time my past fades from memory, fate has a terrible habit of reawakening me.
sentences.chinese: 每次我的過去從記憶退色，命運有可怕的習性回憶我。

sentences.english: Next to our memories, and pale hems of the masters' gown.
sentences.chinese: 偏安於我們的記憶之側，偏安於賢哲長袍退色的下襬。

sentences.english: Finally, this site will stand in the history tide and never fade.
sentences.chinese: 讓秦莊襄王墓恆久的屹立與歷史的洪潮，永不退色。

sentences.english: He was wearing faded blue jeans.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着退色的藍色牛仔褲。

sentences.english: The fading causes of(F2+)H centers and improving method, were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了引起色心退色的原因和改進方法。

sentences.english: Light causes fading and other damage.
sentences.chinese: 光線導致退色或其他損害。
那些窗簾退色退得很厲害。

sentences.english: Some flowers faded with a ligh pink color.
sentences.chinese: 有些花在退色時候還帶着淡淡的粉色。

sentences.english: It was found that the nickel complex was the most effective in inhibiting the photofading of the cyanine dye.
sentences.chinese: 並發現鎳絡合物能有效地抑制菁染料的光退色。

sentences.english: Fourth, dope dyed, will never fade.

definition: to lose color/to fade/also pr. [diao4 shai3]
to lose color/to turn pale/to bleach/to fade
(of the sun) to scorch/to expose to a scorching sun
